    Changes power management configuration in SSM for multiple systems at once.
    PowerManagementOperationsAction
    Powers on, off and reboots multiple systems.
    ProvisioningRemoteCommand
    Remote command for the SSM provisioning.

    Form values bean to keep values if form failed.

    Reboot Systems in the SSM miscellaneous actions.
    RebootSystemConfirmAction
    Confirm reboot of given systems
    RollbackAction

    TagSystemsAction
    Tag system shapshots so that you can roll back to them later
    ViewAllLogAction
    Configures the BaseViewLogAction and its pages to display all operation log entries for the current user.
    ViewCompletedLogAction  
    ViewLogAction
    Configures the BaseViewLogAction and its pages to display in progress operation log entries for the current user.
    ViewLogDetailsAction
    Loads the data for a particular SSM operation (identified by its ID in a request parameter).
